detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque area of Pyrgos, Selene Restaurant offers a breathtaking panoramic view of Santorini's vineyards in Akrotiri and Megalochori. With almost 30 years of experience, this renowned restaurant is celebrated for its new Greek cuisine and fine dining. Housed within an 18th-century Catholic Monastery, the restaurant exudes elegance with its arches, palm trees, and a charming fountain.
name: Selene Restaurant

excerpt: Traditional local dishes served in a laid-back hillside restaurant that has a patio & sea views.
detail_description: Nestled in the quaint village of Exo Gonia, Metaxi Mas is a charming hillside restaurant offering a laid-back atmosphere and stunning sea views. This family-run establishment serves up traditional Cretan dishes with generous portion sizes and complimentary raki, creating an inviting and friendly environment for guests to unwind.
name: Metaxi Mas

detail_description: To Psaraki is a charming restaurant located in the beautiful area of Vlychada, offering a traditional dining experience with delicious seafood and some meat options. The menu features a wide variety of appetizers with Greek and Mediterranean influences, showcasing simple yet high-quality dishes based on traditional Greek cuisine. Notable items include the fish soup and shrimp spaghetti made with fresh local ingredients.
name: To Psaraki

detail_description: Aktaion Restaurant in Firostefani, Santorini is a popular dining spot with stunning views of the famous sunsets and the volcano of Santorini. The restaurant offers high-quality dishes and remains open all year long, serving until late at night. With its prime location on the main road leading from Fira to Firostefani, Aktaion Restaurant provides a perfect setting for enjoying delicious meals while taking in breathtaking scenery.
name: Aktaion Restaurant

detail_description: Aroma Avlis, nestled within the enchanting Artemis Karamolegos Winery in Exo Gonia, Santorini, is a culinary gem that should not be missed during your island adventure. This unique establishment combines a winery and restaurant experience, allowing guests to indulge in authentic Greek dishes crafted from seasonal local ingredients like tomatoes and fava beans. The setting is simply delightful—imagine dining in a cozy courtyard surrounded by lush plants and aromatic herbs while gazing out at the stunning Aegean Sea.
name: Aroma Avlis

detail_description: The Athenian House is a top culinary destination in Santorini, located in Imerovigli with stunning sunset views of the caldera. It offers a relaxed and refined atmosphere and is known for its Michelin-starred chef Jero Serres' creations. The restaurant has received multiple awards and is listed among the 50 best restaurants in the world.
name: The Athenian House

detail_description: 1800-Floga is a renowned restaurant located in an 1845-built mansion in Oia, known for its stunning sea views and award-winning gourmet cuisine. The establishment offers traditional Greek dishes with a modern twist, served in an atmospheric dining room or on a scenic rooftop garden. Some standout dishes include lamb chops with sweet and sour green apple sauce and fresh grouper on Santorinian sun-dried tomatoes and spicy capers.
name: 1800-Floga

detail_description: La Maison is a renowned restaurant located in Santorini, Greece. It is one of the best dining spots in Firostefani, offering breathtaking views of the famous sunsets and the volcano of Santorini. The restaurant provides high-quality dishes and an unforgettable dining experience. With its prime location and excellent cuisine, La Maison is a must-visit for anyone looking to indulge in Greek gastronomy while enjoying stunning vistas.
name: La Maison

excerpt: Locally sourced meals offered in a white-tablecloth choice set on a clifftop terrace with sea views.
detail_description: Lycabettus Restaurant, situated at the Andronis Luxury Suites hotel in Santorini, offers locally sourced meals in an elegant setting with a breathtaking view of the sea. National Geographic Traveler has featured this restaurant for its exceptional location and dining experience. The restaurant's balcony provides a dreamy atmosphere under the starry sky, while Chef Nikos Leivadias crafts imaginative cuisine.
name: Lycabettus Restaurant

excerpt: A traditional local menu is paired with a wine list at this snug venue set in a historic building.
detail_description: Nestled in a charming 1912 building, Roka Oia is a delightful gem that captures the essence of traditional Greek dining. Located just a short stroll from the bustling main strip of Oia, this cozy restaurant offers an inviting atmosphere perfect for romantic evenings or casual meals with friends. While it may not boast sunset views, Roka compensates with its innovative take on classic Greek dishes like tomato fritters and grilled squid paired with black garlic aioli.
name: Roka Oia

detail_description: Perched on a hilltop with stunning views of the caldera, Volkan on the Rocks is a charming brewery in Firostefani, Santorini. This laid-back spot offers Greek beers and a variety of light meals, along with an outdoor cinema for an unforgettable experience. The sun-soaked terrace provides the perfect setting to enjoy a delightful array of hot and cold mezes made from local ingredients, paired with a refreshing pint of Volkan craft beer.
name: Volkan on the Rocks

excerpt: Unassuming restaurant serving local food including moussaka, seafood & meat dishes, plus wine.
detail_description: Anogi is a modest eatery in Imerovigli, Santorini that offers a variety of local dishes such as moussaka, seafood, and meat along with a selection of wines. The restaurant provides an unassuming dining experience for visitors to savor authentic flavors. It's located in close proximity to other popular restaurants and attractions in the area.
name: Anogi

excerpt: Low-key restaurant with a terrace preparing local staples including souvlaki & gyros.
detail_description: Pitogyros Traditional Grill House is a low-key restaurant located in the heart of Oia, Santorini, known for serving local staples like souvlaki and gyros. It's considered one of the best places to enjoy gyros on a budget. In addition to gyros, they also offer souvlaki and giant platters for sharing. The bustling terrace provides a great spot to savor delicious food while taking in the lively atmosphere.
name: Pitogyros Traditional Grill House - Gyros, souvlaki, kebab.

detail_description: Located in Firostefani on the beautiful Santorini island, Remvi Restaurant offers a stunning panoramic terrace and excellent Greek-inspired cuisine. With its breathtaking views, it's perfect for a romantic dinner or a leisurely lunch. The restaurant is popular, so making reservations in advance during the summer season is highly recommended.
name: Remvi Restaurant Santorini

detail_description: Lauda Restaurant, located in Oia, is a beloved dining spot that has been serving locals and travelers for decades. The menu features Greek-inspired dishes with Mediterranean influences, catering to various tastes. Chef Emmanuel Renaut, known for his Michelin-starred expertise, utilizes ingredients from the restaurant's garden to create exceptional flavors while honoring local traditions.
name: Lauda Restaurant

detail_description: Yalos is a beachfront restaurant located on Exo Gialos beach near Fira, offering a modern twist on traditional Greek dishes such as souvlaki and stuffed squid. The boho-luxe decor and DJ music create an atmospheric vibe reminiscent of Ibiza. Visitors can rent sunbeds for the day and enjoy the beach bar menu while watching the sunset over the Aegean Sea with a refreshing cocktail in hand.
name: Yalos

excerpt: Relaxed restaurant serving Mediterranean fare & cocktails, plus terraces & sea views.
detail_description: Argo Restaurant Village is a popular dining spot in Fira, Santorini, known for its relaxed atmosphere and stunning sea views. The restaurant offers a wide selection of Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, with a focus on seafood dishes that shine alongside the beautiful caldera vistas. It's recommended to make reservations well in advance, especially during the busy summer months. The large open-air location attracts a crowd eager to enjoy panoramic views while savoring Greek and international dishes from an environmentally-friendly kitchen.
name: Argo Restaurant Village

excerpt: Locally sourced, organic Mediterranean specialties & wine offered in a casual spot with a terrace.
detail_description: In the charming town of Imerovigli, Santorini, Avocado Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with its locally sourced organic Mediterranean specialties and a selection of fine wines. The restaurant provides a casual atmosphere and features a terrace for guests to enjoy their meals. Visitors can savor authentic Greek cuisine while indulging in four types of Santorini volcanic wines, including the renowned Assyrtiko and Vinsanto wine.
name: Avocado

excerpt: Relaxed seaside restaurant with a terrace plating classic local fare, seafood & desserts, plus wine.
detail_description: Ammoudi Fish Tavern, located below Oia in the picturesque Ammoudi bay, offers a modern yet traditional dining experience with a Mediterranean atmosphere. The restaurant prides itself on using high-quality local ingredients and serves classic Greek dishes alongside fresh seafood and desserts. Guests can enjoy their meal on the terrace overlooking the crystal-clear waters of the Aegean sea, creating an unforgettable dining experience.
name: Ammoudi Fish Tavern
address: Ammoudi Bay, Santorini, Oia, Ammoudi 847 02, Greece

detail_description: Candouni is a charming family-owned restaurant located in Oia, offering a warm and romantic atmosphere. The candlelit patio, traditional Greek music, and intimate dining rooms create a cozy setting for enjoying authentic Greek cuisine. The restaurant is housed in a centuries-old sea captain's house with jasmine-shaded gardens and antique-filled salons. The owner is known for being passionate about providing phenomenal customer service and encourages socialization between tables, creating memorable dining experiences for travelers.
name: Candouni

excerpt: Elevated dishes served in an intimate white-tablecloth eatery that has a terrace & caldera views.
detail_description: Ambrosia Restaurant is a charming white-tablecloth eatery with a terrace offering stunning views of the caldera. It's known for its Greek and Mediterranean cuisine, featuring fresh seafood, meat dishes, and vegetarian creations. The menu includes delectable options like beef fillet with Vinsanto wine and truffles, sea bass grilled in lemon sauce, and risotto tagliatelle with Santorini cherry tomatoes.
name: Ambrosia Restaurant
address: Cliffside Terrace at Village Center, Oía 847 02, Greece

detail_description: Petra Restaurant Bar, located within the luxurious Canaves Oia Suites hotel, offers a breathtaking panoramic view of the Caldera. The culinary team, led by executive chef Tasos Stefatos, presents a contemporary yet familiar menu with a strong Greek influence. They skillfully infuse traditional recipes with modern creativity while preserving their authentic flavors. Visitors can indulge in an exquisite dining experience amidst stunning views and impeccable service.
name: Petra Restaurant Bar

detail_description: Nestled at the end of a dirt road in Vlychada, Theros Wave Bar is a stunning beachfront venue that perfectly captures the essence of Santorini's unique charm. With its breathtaking views and luxurious ambiance, it’s an ideal spot for those seeking a tropical beach bar experience. The bar features plush interiors and ample loungers where guests can unwind while sipping on delicious cocktails.
name: Theros Wave bar

detail_description: Located on a small beach along the south coast, Nikolas is a traditional taverna that has been in the same family for three generations. It offers a solid and hearty meal away from the busy atmosphere found elsewhere on the island. Many of their fish dishes are caught by owner Nikolas himself, while their meat dishes feature meats sourced from their family farm. This authentic Greek restaurant can be easily found in Fira with directions from locals or simply by exploring its charming streets.
name: Nikolas

excerpt: Down-home waterfront destination featuring seafood dishes & traditional small plates.
detail_description: Dimitris Ammoudi Taverna is a charming seaside restaurant located in the old fisherman's harbor of Hammoudi Bay, offering stunning views of the Santorini castle. The taverna serves a simple yet delicious menu featuring fresh-caught seafood, local delicacies like fava and tomatokeftedes, and traditional small plates. It's recommended to make reservations for dinner, especially if you want a table by the water with an hour before sunset for a breathtaking experience.
name: Dimitris Ammoudi Taverna

detail_description: Nestled in the captivating Imerovigli, Kapari Wine Restaurant offers an unforgettable gastronomic experience with its superb selection of Greek wines and delectable local specialties. The restaurant's whitewashed Cycladic building provides a romantic setting, especially on the candlelit terrace where guests can savor top-notch wines while enjoying dishes like aubergine with fava and smoked octopus against the backdrop of a picturesque caldera sunset.
name: Kapari Wine Restaurant

detail_description: To Pinakio is a charming meze taverna located in Kamari town, offering affordable and tasty snacks accompanied by traditional local music. The ambiance is delightful, and the staff is known for their friendliness. The establishment provides uncomplicated service with great value and fantastic tasting dishes, including traditional favorites like fava beans and eggplant puree paired with locally produced wines. Visitors can expect an enjoyable experience with excellent acoustics while indulging in a variety of meze selections.
name: To Pinakio
address: Panagias Myrtidiotissas, Epar.Od. Mesarias-Archeas Thiras, Kamari 847 00, Greece

detail_description: Nestled on the edge of a cliff in Firostefani, Mylos Champagne Bar - Restaurant offers stunning views of the sea and volcano. The restaurant's romantic ambiance is enhanced by glowing lights and candle-lit tables, providing a comfortable setting with pillows for an enjoyable evening. In addition to Mediterranean dishes, Mylos also serves delectable sushi. Housed inside an old windmill, this sophisticated bar provides fine dining experiences and delightful desserts like the Chocolate Painting.
name: Mylos Champagne Bar - Restaurant

excerpt: Classic dishes, small plates, pasta & risotto are served at this casual restaurant with a patio.
detail_description: Ouzeri is a casual restaurant located in Fira, offering classic Greek dishes and unique cuisine with a twist. The restaurant provides a cozy atmosphere for guests to enjoy small plates, pasta, and risotto on its patio. It is conveniently situated just off the main walkway, close to Santorini Bus Stop 10 and the Museum of Prehistoric Thera.
name: Ouzeri

detail_description: Elements Restaurant Bar is a modern and elegant dining space located within the Canaves Oia Epitome hotel in Santorini. The restaurant offers unobstructed views of the Aegean Sea and stunning sunsets, creating an incredible dining atmosphere. Executive chef Tasos Stefatos presents international cuisine with Greek elements, drawing inspiration from the Ionian islands.
name: Elements Restaurant Bar

detail_description: Nestled in the charming Vourvoulos village, Roza's (formerly Taverna Roza) is a delightful dining spot just a short drive from Santorini's caldera and east coast. The restaurant boasts a picturesque open terrace adorned with bougainvillea, lemon-leaf plants, vines, and jasmine. Renowned for its homemade Greek cuisine, Roza's offers delectable dishes such as fresh cheese, hand-cut fries, and Greek yogurt.
name: Roza's

detail_description: Nestled in the charming Oia, Red Bicycle is a must-visit upscale restaurant housed in a 19th-century mansion. Its Greek creative cuisine offers traditional flavors with an elevated twist. The chic interior adorned with Maria Callas photographs leads to a stunning terrace boasting panoramic views of the caldera and Santorini's iconic white buildings and blue-domed churches.
name: Red Bicycle

detail_description: Ftelos Brewery Santorini - MALT Restaurant is a cutting-edge organic brewery and restaurant located just a few steps away from the bustling Fira. The brewery offers a variety of signature craft beers, including the popular Blue Monkey lager, and hosts home brewing master classes for beer enthusiasts. Adjacent to the brewery, MALT Restaurant provides a chic dining experience with its glass-walled ambiance and modern Mediterranean menu.
name: Ftelos Brewery Santorini - MALT Restaurant

detail_description: Varoulko Santorini is a renowned restaurant located inside the elegant Grace hotel in stunning Imerovigli. Originally opened in 1987 in Piraeus, Varoulko has garnered numerous accolades, including a Michelin star in 2002. The founder and chef, Lefteris Lazarou, played a pivotal role in elevating seafood to a new level of fine dining in Greece.
name: Varoulko Santorini

detail_description: Nestled in a traditional old mansion in the heart of Megalochori, Feggera offers a delightful dining experience with a focus on exquisite Greek cuisine using local, natural products. The rooftop terrace provides a charming setting to savor Aegean dishes made with organic Cretan ingredients. Guests can also partake in cooking classes to learn the secrets of Santorinian recipes.
name: Feggera

detail_description: Located in one of Santorini's historic tomato canneries, Forty One 41 is a chic restaurant offering Mediterranean dishes with a view of Perivolos beach. The charming private dining room is perfect for romantic wine tastings and food pairings. This new addition to the Santorini beach club scene boasts a boho design and comfortable atmosphere, making it an excellent choice for beachgoers. Guests praise the professional staff, delicious sushi, and unreal cocktails.
name: Forty One 41

detail_description: Koukoumavlos Restaurant is a renowned dining spot located in the picturesque area of Fira, Santorini. It offers an exceptional fine dining experience with a stunning panoramic view of the caldera from its terrace. The restaurant's elegant design and creative cuisine by Chef Nikos Pouliasis make it a must-visit for those seeking a memorable culinary journey. Guests can expect impeccable service and an extensive selection of dishes paired with carefully curated wines.
name: Koukoumavlos Restaurant

detail_description: Oia VineyART Homes is a romantic restaurant located in Santorini, offering fresh seasonal dishes made with local products from the Cyclades. The restaurant boasts an impressive wine cellar featuring bottles from every vineyard on the island. With a fabulous location and brilliant views, it's a great place to enjoy local cuisine and hospitality. Reservations are recommended for an unforgettable dining experience at Oia VineyART Homes.
name: Oia VineyART Homes

excerpt: Petite venue with outdoor seating & sea views offering meat, seafood & vegetarian small plates.
detail_description: Melitini is a charming small restaurant with a bohemian style, offering outdoor seating with stunning sea views. The menu features traditional Greek dishes such as grilled octopus, lamb sausage, and freshly baked pita with feta cheese, aubergine and tzatziki dips. It's advisable to arrive early or book in advance due to its popularity among locals and tourists alike. The restaurant is known for its delicious meze menu, offering a variety of Greek dishes at reasonable prices.
name: Melitini

detail_description: Wet Stories is a stylish beach club located on the black sands of Perivolos Beach in Santorini. It offers a fantastic Japanese-inspired menu and signature cocktails for visitors to enjoy while relaxing on comfortable sunbeds or huge beanbags. The beach bar is known for hosting some of the best beach parties on the island, featuring live music from DJs and delicious cocktails. Additionally, it's a great spot to savor a meal by the sea.
name: Wet Stories Santorini

detail_description: Franco's Café is a charming spot located at the top of Pyrgos, offering delightful food and beverages along with a mesmerizing view of Pyrgos and the entire island. The café provides a magical ambiance with classical music playing in the background. It is highly recommended to visit during the day for refreshing drinks and snacks, as well as during sunset for a memorable dinner experience.
name: Franco's Cafè
address: Epar.Od. Pirgou Kallistis - Profiti Ilia, Pirgos Kallistis 847 00, Greece

detail_description: Katharos Lounge Vegan Meze Bar is a laid-back beach bar located on the secluded Katharos Beach in Oia. It offers a range of Greek beers, including Santorini's own IPA, Crazy Donkey, and provides front-row seats to breathtaking sunsets. The restaurant is known for its vegan and vegetarian dishes served right by the seaside, allowing guests to enjoy great food with the sound of waves in the background.
name: Katharos Lounge Vegan Meze Bar

detail_description: Catch Bar-Restaurant is a trendy spot with an all-white decor that accentuates its extravagant, theatrical cocktails served in unique glassware. The menu is organized around the elements of earth, air, fire and water. This luxury gastronomic place offers a wide range of culinary proposals featuring Mediterranean, European and Greek flavors made with carefully selected ingredients. With a warm atmosphere and spectacular view, Catch stands out for its eccentric dishes.
name: Catch Bar-Restaurant

excerpt: Laid-back restaurant with colorful decor & sea views, preparing classic local & European dishes.
detail_description: Kokkalo is a laid-back restaurant in Santorini with colorful decor and sea views, offering classic local and European dishes. Located on the main road from Fira to Firostefani, it remains open all year round, serving high-quality dishes until late at night. The restaurant preserves the atmosphere of old-style Aegean taverns and serves homemade traditional dishes such as local fava and tomato fritters.
name: Kokkalo

detail_description: Sunset Ammoudi by Paraskevas is a charming hidden spot in Oia, Santorini, nestled at the base of the Caldera cliffs. It's renowned for its breathtaking sunset views over the Aegean Sea, making it a perfect location for capturing stunning photographs. The tiny fishing port offers a variety of dining options with picturesque backdrops, including the popular Thalami known for its delectable pasta and lobster dishes.
name: Sunset Ammoudi by Paraskevas

detail_description: Rosemary is a top dining spot in Pyrgos, Santorini, offering both indoor and outdoor spaces adorned with elegant decor. It provides stunning sunset views and a creative menu featuring the perfect blend of Santorinian ingredients for a delightful meal. Located in the former capital of Santorini, visitors can relish panoramic views of the pre-volcanic hinterland while enjoying their dining experience at Rosemary.
name: Rosemary

detail_description: Luckys Souvlakis is a small, unassuming spot located near Fira's bus station in Santorini. Despite its unimpressive appearance, it offers some of the most delicious food on the island. Specializing in souvlaki and gyros, this fast-food style eatery serves up kebab-style meat skewers and shaved pork or chicken wrapped in fluffy pita bread with generous helpings of tzatziki.
name: Lucky's Souvlakis

detail_description: The Dolphins is a charming taverna located near the Aegean Sea, offering a great view of the water. It's a bit hidden but worth finding, with seating right beside the sea. The family-run restaurant serves delicious and well-priced food, including tzatziki, Santorini salad, and Pandora fish. While some visitors found the shrimp disappointing, others enjoyed unique dishes like grilled pandora and swordfish.
name: The Dolphins

detail_description: Fly Away Creative Restaurant & Bar offers a wonderful experience with a warm welcome and professional staff. The stunning views make the stay friendly and enjoyable. The service is fantastic, and the food quality is top-notch, making it one of the best restaurants on the island. While some find the price of water high, others appreciate the excellent service and breathtaking sunset views. The chef's culinary skills shine through in every dish, making each visit an exquisite experience.
name: Fly Away Creative Restaurant & Bar

detail_description: Sphinx Wine Restaurant is a renowned upscale dining establishment located in the heart of Fira. Housed in a beautifully restored mansion, it offers an extensive international wine list and a mainly Mediterranean menu with creative flair. Diners can choose to enjoy their meal on the rooftop terrace with stunning sunset views or in the elegant vaulted-ceilinged dining room. The restaurant also features original artwork by local artists, adding to its unique charm.
name: Sphinx Wine Restaurant
